MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  We are arranging to have engineers investigate the fault, and we hope to have your electricity restored by 13-NOV-2020 17:13.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the CH48 postcode area of Wirral,  affecting properties in Franky Road, Baytree Road and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  12:22 PM. Our engineers have arrived on site and have confirmed that the fault has been caused by a fault with the Generator are currently awaiting the specialist contractors to attend and repair the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by  5:15 PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:23 PM on 13th November 2020.
